label: Description
value: Section of wide border of linen of cutwork with reticella and embroidery. Design in horizontal bands, of geometric elements, with confronted birds in embroidery.

label: Description
value: Large collar and pair of cuffs. Needle lace, Flat Point de Venise, in all-over branching floral pattern, connected by bride picotées. Portes throughout.

label: Description
value: Part of a narrow flounce in an Art Nouveau pattern of floral sprays.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: needle and bobbin lace motifs appliquéd to machine made net

label: Description
value: Black handkerchief with a sheer center center field and a deep border of black Chantilly-style lace. A large flower with leaves marks the four corners and the center of each side. Between are rows of scallops and small sprigs of flowers.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk Technique: bobbin lace, Chantilly style Label: silk bobbin lace

label: Description
value: Handkerchief in piña cloth with scalloped edge, buttonholed and with border of flowering vine, embroidered in cotton, crossing circles of drawnwork. Corner in black and white with word: "Recuerdo" with bird above and small dog or cat below flowers.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: piña (pineapple) fiber, cotton Technique: embroidery and drawnwork on plain weave

label: Description
value: Diagonal repeat of large symmetrical tulip-like flowers with smaller tulip and broad-toothed leaves on either side of stem. Diamond rosette diaper filling interstices. In tarnished white metal threads in plain and fancy twill and coarse white satin ground. Wide plain cloth selvages. Plain satin area on top with fragmentary woven inscription in white on blue band.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk, metallic foil on a silk core Technique: compound satin

label: Description
value: Pair of earrings of gilt metal, filigree, the outer half circle form has suspended white glass pearls and beads in green and turquoise.  Inner circle is set with pendants.

label: Physical description
value: Gilt and filigreed metal, glass pearls and beads

label: Description
value: Pair of earrings. Turquoise matrix and silver.

label: Description
value: Filigree and modeled disks bordered with half-rings, on filigree form set with three turquoises.

label: Description
value: Hand or foot piece, silver, with small balls, in clusters, and seven pendant rings on chains.

label: Description
value: Pair of brass ear-plugs, round. Red Setting of glass on composition. Ornament, concentric circles (4) of grain-like pattern with holes punched to emphasize separate grains.

label: Description
value: Pair of silver anklets. Five cartridge shapes, with decorative balls, on cord.

label: Description
value: Necklace: Thin metal (copper or gilt alloy) with tooled ornaments, each bead filled with composition. Cloth disks separate the beads from each other. Most beads are roughly flattened spherical. Two adjoining are conical tubular.

value: White lace shawl of fine mesh with detached floral designs and a wide floral border.

value: Medium: linen Technique: Brussels-style bobbin lace

value: Fragment of rectangular doily of compound satin, brocaded: Same material and facing as 1951-112-14.  Slightly different metallic galloon.

value: Medium: silk, silver foil on silk thread Technique: woven

label: Description
value: Large rectangular panel made of many small rectangular pieces of gold cloth. Gold rosettes in squares alternate with elongated hexagons filled with diapers or landscapes. Silks in soft blue, peach and yellow bound in twill weave adn gilded paper strips bound in plain weave fill subordinate areas of these designs. Pulp paper backing; green silk facing.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk, gilded paper strips Technique: sewn pieced work

label: Description
value: a and b are joined together. a): Outlines (incomplete) of a possible medallion, and pin dots, in green. Traces of white scroll work; b): A vertical stripe of dark green set with medallions to one side of which are white wavy grasses. Additional fragment adheres to this; c): Red and green ladder design.

label: Description
value: a) Beige ground with green leafy clusters. Green vertical ladder band; b) Beige paper with trace of brown and orange design at one side; c) Gold on beige. Diagonal diaper. Stylized foliate forms at intersections and at centers; d) Large cream-colored magnolia-like blossom and leaves. Beige ground.

label: Provenance
value: Layers put on a partition in an old farm house in Marlboro, Massachusetts, during the 19th century. Letter, March 1951.

value: Traditional grasscloth in shades of tan.

Winter from the Series, The Four Seasons

label: Description

label: Description
value: Short wide apron of white embroidered in silver thread, rose, violet and white. Design is a large central flower spray of carnation and lily with leaves in silver thread. Corner design of cornucopia with sprays of tulips and lilies. Bottom and sides have a subtle scallops bordered in a sawtooth pattern in silver thread.
